title: Ms
questions:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am looking for a syringe micro-drive pump that can be attached to a pulled glass capillary for stereotaxic intraspinal injections at an infusion rate of 200 nl/min. Could you please let me know the options available for this type of method, injections need to be very precise and stable (no vibration from motor) and let me know the prices please.

Many thanks,

Yazi
